name: opentuna
description: It's an app to deploy open tuna on AWS.

scripts.init: npx cdk bootstrap --app 'npx ts-node bin/opentuna-network.ts' && npm run install-deps
scripts.install-deps: npm ci && npm i --prefix lib/lambda.pipelines.d/approver-actions && npm i --prefix lib/lambda.pipelines.d/approver-notification
scripts.deploy-network: npx cdk deploy OpenTunaNetworkStack --app 'npx ts-node bin/opentuna-network.ts'
scripts.deploy-pipeline: mkdir -p cdk.out && aws ssm get-parameter --name /opentuna/pipeline/stage/uat --query 'Parameter.Value' --output text >cdk.out/uat.json && aws ssm get-parameter --name /opentuna/pipeline/stage/prod --query 'Parameter.Value' --output text >cdk.out/prod.json && npx cdk deploy OpenTunaPipelineStack --app 'npx ts-node bin/opentuna-pipeline.ts'
scripts.deploy-pipeline-cross-account-setup: npx cdk deploy PipelineCrossAccountDeploymentSetupStack --app 'npx ts-node bin/opentuna-pipeline-setup.ts'
